data.description: Allows you to query Quakeworld servers
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows people to query and inspect Quakeworld (Quake 1)
    servers. Yet I haven't seen a module that allows this or does query
    game servers. This module is good for all kind of stuff, that is CGI
    scripts, IRC bots and normal perl applications (command line).
